channel.title: CVE Feed for tislam100 -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for tislam100 -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-5964|2024-08-01T21:25:03.165Z -- tislam100 -- zenon%20lite
item.description: The Zenon Lite theme for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘url’ parameter within the theme's Button shortcode in all versions up to, and including, 1.9 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-5925|2024-08-01T21:25:03.176Z -- tislam100 -- theron%20lite
item.description: The Theron Lite theme for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘url’ parameter within the theme's Button shortcode in all versions up to, and including, 2.0 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
